text: Stephen Myron Schwebel (born March 10, 1929), is an American jurist, counsel and independent arbitrator. He serves as Judge of the World Bank Administrative Tribunal and as a member of the U.S. national group at the Permanent Court of Arbitration.http://www.pca- cpa.org/showpaged254.html?pag_id=1041 == References == Category:American judges Category:People from New York City Category:1929 births Category:Living people
title: Stephen M. Schwebel
